com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth

Class HttpAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.HttpAccess

  • public class HttpAccess
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Generic HTTP Access layer - used internally by RestClient and OAuth2. This class watches network changes as well.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpAccess.Execution
      Wrapper around an HTTP call and its response.
      static class  HttpAccess.NoNetworkException
      Exception thrown if the device is offline, during an attempted HTTP call.
